cu.explanation_en: Setting mcc to an out-of-range value (999) will cause invalid PLMN configuration and network registration failure.

du.explanation_en: Setting pMax to an out-of-range value (100) will cause invalid power configuration and uplink transmission issues.
du.explanation_zh: 將 pMax 設定為超出範圍的值 (100)，會導致無效的功率配置，並造成上行傳輸問題。
